html.title: FindSampo – Finnish Archaeological Finds on the Semantic Web
html.description: FindSampo is a semantic portal and a Linked Open Data service for searching and analyzing archaeological finds

appTitle.subheading: Finnish Archaeological Citizen Finds on the Semantic Web

leafletMap.wrongZoomLevelFHA: The map zoom level has to be at least 13 in order to show this layer

finds.label: Finds
finds.longDescription:
This perspective is used for searching and browsing archaeological finds using a set of facets on the left. Currenly the are around 3000 metal detecting finds, and some other finds, from the records of the Finnish Heritage Agency available for browsing. More finds will be added to the portal later. The results can be viewed on the right using the following tabs:

  • TABLE tab presents the results as paginated table
  • MAPS tab shows the results on an interactive map. The base map and additional map layers can be selected using the button on the top right corner of the map. For FHA map layers the zoom level must 13 or greater.
  • HEATMAP tab shows the results set as a heatmap.
  • TIMELINE tab shows a timeline visualization of the result set.
  • PIE & BAR CHART tab visualizes the result set finds statistically using either 1) a pie chart or 2) a bar chart. The finds distribution can be based on 1) object type, 2) material or 3) province where the find was made.
  • LINE CHART tab visualizes the number of finds (y-axis) of different weights (x-axis).
  • CSV tab is used for downloading the current result set as a CSV file for further analysis in an external tool, such as a spreadsheet program.

instancePage.label: Find
instancePage.description:
This page aggregates information about this archaeological find, including metadata and image from the original database, but also other related data of interest. The following tabs can used for showing information about the find:

  • TABLE tab shows the original metadata of the find. This is the default tab.
  • MAP tab shows location of the find-spot on a map.
  • NEARBY FINDS tab shows on a map other finds that have been found nearby.
  • RECOMMENDATION LINKS tab shows links to other finds that are semantically related to the find, including finds with similar object type, made of similar material, and from the same time period. Such recommendations can be created automatically based on the connections in the underlying linked data.

findNumber.label: Accession number
findNumber.description: Accession number of the find in the FHA records

findText.label: Text search
findText.description: Search with free text based on name, number or description of the find. To search with a phrase or the full accession number use quotation marks.

prefLabel.label: Find name
prefLabel.description: Find name including a broad classification of the object and the accession number.

facetObjectType.label: Object type
facetObjectType.description: Object type of the find using a facet ontology created by the FHA.

period.label: Period
period.description: Period when the object was created. May include both earliest and latest periods.

dateTimespan.label: Dating
dateTimespan.description: Search based on the dating of the find.

startYear.label: Start year
startYear.description: Earliest creation year of the object as determined by a specialist.

endYear.label: End year
endYear.description: Latest creation year of the object as determined by a specialist.

earliestStartYear.label: Earliest manufacture time
earliestStartYear.description: Earliest presumed manufacture date of the object based on a year determined by a specialist or automatically deduced based on period

latestEndYear.label: Latest manufacture time
latestEndYear.description: Latest presumed manufacture date of the object based on a year determined by a specialist or automatically deduced based on period

ceramicStyle.label: Ceramic style
ceramicStyle.description: Ceramic culture associated with the object

weight.label: Weight
weight.description: Weight of the object in grams

length.label: Length
length.description: Length of the object in millimeters

maxThickness.label: Maximum thickness
maxThickness.description: Maximum thickness of the object in millimeters

minThickness.label: Minimum thickness
minThickness.description: Minimum thickness of the object in millimeters

width.label: Width
width.description: Width of the object in millimeters

diameter.label: Diameter
diameter.description: Diameter of the object in millimeters

similarPeriod.label: Finds from the same time period
similarPeriod.description: Finds from the same time period

similarExternalFind.label: Similar external find
similarExternalFind.description: Similar finds in PAS (Portable Antiquities Scheme)

foundAtHeight.label: Height
foundAtHeight.description: Height of the find site above the sea level in meters

archaeologicalSiteUrl.label: Archeological site URL address
archaeologicalSiteUrl.description: URL of the find site in the Ancient Relics Register (muinaisjäännösrekisteri, kyppi-portaali)

typology.label: Typological description
typology.description: Typological description of the find (e.g. ceramic style)

instancePage.label: Object type
instancePage.description: This page has information relating to an object type.

aatTerm.label: Matching AAT term
aatTerm.description: Matching term in the Art & Architecture Thesaurus of the Getty Research Institute

ltkName.label: Object names
ltkName.description: Object names from LTK data that are mapped to this term.

pasLink.label: Link PAS database
pasLink.description: Objects of similar type in the PAS database, British Museum

instancePage.label: Period
instancePage.description: This page includes information relating to a period.

hiddenLabel.label: Alternative terms
hiddenLabel.description: possible alternative terms for the period

earliestBegin.label: Earliest start year
earliestBegin.description: Earliest year that the period started

latestEnd.label: Latest end year
latestEnd.description: Latest year that the period ended

latestBegin.label: Latest start year
latestBegin.description: Latest year that the period started

earliestEnd.label: Earliest end year
earliestEnd.description: Earliest year that the period ended

broaderPeriod.label: Broader period (era)
broaderPeriod.description: Era that this period is part of

narrowerPeriod.label: Narrower periods
narrowerPeriod.description: Periods that are a part of this era

ilppari.label: Ilppari
ilppari.shortDescription: Reporting service for archaelogical finds found in Finland

map.label: Maps
map.shortDescription: Interactive maps for finding and visualizing archaelogical finds

sites.label: Sites
sites.shortDescription: Search and view archaeological sites and protected areas
sites.longDescription: This perspective first asks permission to locate the user and then shows registered archaeological points and sites around the user where metal detecting is prohibited.

guides.label: Guides
guides.shortDescription: Guides and instructions for archaeology as a hobby
